name: Dmitro Serdun
intro:
Hi, let me introduce myself. 
Me twenty-five years and i Live in Ukraine, Odesa. I'm a mobile developer with more than 4 years of experience.
My essential platform is Android but for the last 2 years  in general i've created or were practiced Flutter cross-platform projects. 
By the way you are checking my Flutter skills directly at the moment while scrolling this page)
                      

Glory to Ukraine
